Introduction
This topic contains information on extracts from Army SGO records, including
origin of the extracts from SGO records
Veterans for whom an SGO extract may exist
limitations and use of extracts from SGO records
details contained in SGO extracts
determining whether NPRC previously searched for SGO extracts for a specific Veteran
when to submit a request for copies of extracts
associating extracts with the proper Veteran
when to submit a supplemental request for copies of extracts
claims denied prior to May 18, 1990, for which SGO extracts might exist
, and
Not Found
entries in SGO extracts
.
title: M21-1, Part III, Subpart ii, Chapter 2, Section F - Fire-Related Records, Supplementary or Substitute Records, and Records for Unique Situations
citation: Part III, Subpart ii, Chapter 2, Section F
